ygData.subject: Re: Doh! They forget us !!!
ygData.msgSnippet: What about our ae spel ? and pe spel ?? Did someone here use them ???? NOBODY... I use the ae spells all the time in group.  For example, when we are fighting,
ygData.messageBody:
What about our ae spel ? and pe spel ?? Did someone here use them ????
NOBODY...


I use the ae spells all the time in group. For example, when we are
fighting, say, orcs, and 3 of them attack our warriors, I use column of
frost. It damages all 3 of them quickly. I was doing that last night, and
could cast it 3 times quickly in succession without angering any of the
orcs. Thats was nearly 100 damage to all THREE with no danger to me. My
group was impressed.

JW
